project.name: GoalPost
project.description: GoalPost is an open-source, privacy-centered platform that supports mutual aid groups, worker cooperatives, and communities of care in coordinating with trust, consent, and dignity. We empower small, trust-based groups to map goals, resources, and mutual support networks without relying on extractive corporate technology.

needs: We seek $50,000 in funding to expand GoalPostâ€™s decentralized infrastructure, enabling secure federated discovery across small community instances; to develop privacy-first peer-to-peer resource sharing; and to support training, documentation, and onboarding for grassroots mutual aid groups and worker cooperatives using GoalPost. We are committed to keeping GoalPost open-source, community-co-governed, and relationally stewarded by frontline movements.
